flawed_nl_solution:
She has 420 minutes to write because 4 x 60 = <<4*60=420>>420
She will write 4200 words because 420 x 10 = <<420*10=4200>>4200
She will earn $420 for the words because 4200 x 0.1 = <<4200*0.1=420>>420
She will earn $180 from the articles because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=180>>180
She will earn $600 in total because 420 + 180 = <<420+180=600>>600
She will average $150 an hour because 600 / 4 = <<600/4=150>>150
#### 150

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 240, not 420. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
